trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when the <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn.Expression"></xref> property of a <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> contains a syntax error.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SyntaxErrorException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SyntaxErrorException"></xref> class with the specified string.
The string to display when the exception is thrown.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SyntaxErrorException"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref>.
The data needed to serialize or deserialize an object.
The source and destination of a specific serialized stream.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SyntaxErrorException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
